price: (Muusaan) ni jedhe: “Isheen ulee tiyya; ishee irrattin hirkadha; Re’ee tiyyaaf isheenin (baala mukaa) harcaasa. Ishee keessa anaaf dhimmi biraas ni jira” .
arabic: قَالَ هِيَ عَصَايَ أَتَوَكَّؤُاْ عَلَيۡهَا وَأَهُشُّ بِهَا عَلَىٰ غَنَمِي وَلِيَ فِيهَا مَـَٔارِبُ أُخۡرَىٰ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qāla hiya ʿaṣāya atawakka-u ʿalayhā wa-ahushu bihā ʿalā ghanamī waliya fīhā maāribu ukh'rā
